website_summaries.verdict: Although inexpensive to operate and easy to use, the Canon Selphy DS810's mediocre output limits this compact photo printer's appeal for serious photo enthusiasts.

customer_reviews.title: Saved Santaland
customer_reviews.text: Our previous printer, same make and model, decided to quit during photos with Santa. We were able to get a replacement almost immediately and get those photos printed and to the folks before the holidays. This is a great on-site printer that hook directly to my camera and gives us instant photos while folks are still visiting with Santa.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, not super user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a tech genius, but I'm definetely capable of figuring out tech items. This is super easy to hook up, however, tweaking the settings to make your pictures look great (I/e not balanced and dark) is tricky at best. I spent two hours fussing with it and still couldn't get as good of results as I wanted. I've bought refill paper/ink and every time the ink runs out before the paper does. This ends up being about the same cost per print as taking film to Costco or Wal-mart, the convenience of having it available and in home is great... it's just not super user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Great at home photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Got this from Amazon on sale before Christmas. We really love it since we have a new baby--we just print photos off of our CF Card and send to the grandparents weekly. Love the feature where you can print 1-8 pictures per 4x6 photo paper. I've printed smaller photos for scrapbooks, office and my planner. It's great that we can just print photos for friends and family right after any event. I highly recommend this and the Canon ink and paper value packs.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl

customer_reviews.title: Not quite hat I expected
customer_reviews.text: The previous Canon SELPHY we had purchased was a dye-subliminal printer and so much easier to use with the printer and paper in one package. The DS810 was a regular inject and a little more difficult to set up and use. It is an OK printer nothing more nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The DS810 is a great printer for the price. I've had a few problems with print quality, and when i print several pictures back to back without giving the printer a break, it tends to spit little blue dots everywhere on the picture. Other than that its a great printer. Easy to use, easy to set up, and nice looking prints.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for about 10-20 prints than it developed a color ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about 10-20 prints than it developed a color cast that coulden't be fixed with new ink
customer_reviews.author: wallio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great VFM
customer_reviews.text: Can't recommend this product highly enough. Set up with my home PC was simple and straight forward. I use Google's Picassa and the quality of the prints is outstanding. Loading the ink was straight forward and the printer screen and menu easy to see and use.
customer_reviews.author: John Carey

customer_reviews.title: Cannon SELPHY DS810
customer_reviews.text: Printer works fine, prints excellent pictures. Setup with the cable connect was a bit technical (This was purchased for 87 year old father-in-law). Printing from the memory stick was a more straight-forward. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ropes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Printer for Small Projects!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this is they no longer make the credit card paper which I printed on.... Good Luck. . Works well and forever.....other wise!
customer_reviews.author: M Smyth

customer_reviews.title: SELPHY Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME product, I am so completely satisfied with it! The price was great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny E. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selphy DS810
customer_reviews.text: Its an amazing little printer. It was very simple to hook up and was able to start printing right away. There is only one small draw back. If you wait a few days in between printing it takes about 3 printings to get everything back in a working order. Other than that. I love this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Won't work with my card. I continue getting an error message.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Cool package, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: For a dedicated photo printer, I enjoy the ease of getting prints with the Canon software interface. This little number produces nice output. Consumables deplete rapidly but they don't scare you at the register. Ink tanks can be had for under $10. Some trouble with white edges on borderless prints, but power cycling seems to solve it. Paper tray leaves sheets hanging out in front where they are in the way. I use this printer to get quick snaps for fun and transmit or take my serious stuff to the photo finisher for prints. That said I'm happy enough with this purchase as it fits my need without regrets.
customer_reviews.author: OneLongGroove

customer_reviews.title: selphy photo  ptinter.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this printer. Great pictures. Clear. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Beerkircher

customer_reviews.title: cannon selphy ds810 printer
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but it is very hard to find printer ink for it and when you do, it is quite expensive. The idea of having a small portable printer was very appealing, but I wouldn't do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Burk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This printer came without a printer head, usual manual & cd. Not sure what I can do with it now. It was a gift & now past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Westrick

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selphy DS810 photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old HP photo printer for this one. The buttons on the HP Printer were becoming difficult to make it work. The Canon Selphy printer was horrible. The quality of the prints didn't even come close to the HP quality. I could only print 15 photos before the cartridge became clogged and had to call tech support which didn't solve my problem. I returned the printer and will purchase an HP printer again. I don't recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: 4x6 photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Works great and price is amazing for this technology. Could be just a bite faster.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wille

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this
customer_reviews.text: The printing quality is good, but that's the only positive thing I can say. There's no place to leave paper in the printer, the indicator about which side of the paper to have in the "up" position is misleading, leading two a complete mess as you waste ink printing the wrong side of the paper. Even worse, it only allows you to plug in proprietary devices: Try to plug your USB storage device or any non-Canon device into it and it tells you it's incompatible. I got a $[...] rebate and it's still not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Restorm

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied, thinking of buying another one for back up
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality and easy use of this printer. For the low price and the extra $40 value with two ink tanks & 140 sheets of canon paper it's about the best deal you can get for the quality. If you have a canon camera already, it produces decent quality prints. You don't have to have a canon camera to use this item. You must use cannon paper only, I tried Hp paper and it prints on it but not as good as cannon. You can only take 4x6 photo's.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Selphy photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing! Great picture quality (from a 3 color cartridge)! It's hard to tell the difference from my Canon i960 desktop photo printer (with 6 color printing). Just remember, garbage in, garbage out, for those of you that don't agree with what I am writing (because of 1 review that I read, before I purchased it). (Appearently, somebody must have tried to make silk from a sows ear, on that review). And, fast too! It is worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: I've printed several pictures with no problems so far. I particularly like the size. It is unobtrusive; sitting near my monitor (on a very cluttered desk). Though the quality is fine for everyday use it is not professional grade but then I didn't expect it to be when I decided to purchase it. Overall, I'm quite satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine but.....
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for quick 4X6 prints in a pinch. Just carry it with you and find an outlet. But if paper feeder poops out on you check the button battery located in base of machine. I was ready to trash mine because the paper would not feed. I could not find any reference to this battery in Canon's instructions. I believe its a 2032 cell.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PHOTO PRINTER!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item from Amazon.com because of the instant rebate and ink offer. I was FLOORED when I saw the quality of the pictures printed. This printer is so easy to use, I started printing in minutes. So far I have printed almost 100 pictures and it's still going strong. BUY this printer if you like taking and printing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: nan_c77

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 x 6 printer!
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of this item was the display model from a local office supply store. I liked it so much I purchased 2 additional units, one extra for myself and one as a gift. I even took it with us on vacation. Good print quality and easy to use. Canon USA support is excellent. Only drawback with this unit is that you can NOT use any other ink other than Canon. Also recommended is Canon paper for prints that will last one hundred years. Good machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NHC

customer_reviews.title: A great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this printer so my wife can print directly from the my Canon Rebel XT. Very easy to use printer with decent output. I love the ability to connect via pictureBridge or just stick the card in the slot. Paper handling is very smooth and the print comes out very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shahar Tamari

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Don't be afraid of buying a refurb. This printer looks brand new. I get 70 pictures out a color cartridge. I set my camera to fine detail, and vivid color most of the time. On standered color, could see getting 100 pictures on 1 catridge. I received fast shipping, means alot to get something when you want it now. This is one great printer, pictures are the best I have printed on any of the 3 printers I own. You will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: William Megelsh

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer for Christmas and so far am very pleased. It is quiet, fast, and the picture quality is quite good. It gives me the ability to print snapshots size photos without a lot of fuss. The only drawback that I have seen is the inability to use a thumbdrive as an input. There are other printers available that do allow for that capability and I would find it quite useful. I have tried the printer both as a stand-alone unit and connected to a laptop. The printer was purchased as a factory refurbished unit from Fry's electronics at the ridiculously low price of $40!
customer_reviews.author: The Reel McCoy

customer_reviews.title: card doesnt work.  error message
customer_reviews.text: Great printer but if you have a newer camera the card may not work. So use a camera that is compatable. In my case I just used an older camera. Remember this is an older printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This printer is okay. I actually don't use it as much as I thought I would. I go the pharmacy machine as it is faster. Also if they get smudged I don't have to pay for them there. I have had a few pictures print out smudged. I wish it has more options. It's okay, but I probably wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selphy Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: It is a compact printer that will produce very good quality 4" X 6" prints in less than one minute. It is light weight and small enough to transport to a given location (Christmas party, family reunion or other location) and present the subjects with their own prints to go on the spot. They are better than Polaroid prints. The prints are not professional quality but are close to it.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Lichwala

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This little printer has all the features! You can practically print pictures from any source - even capable of wireless printing! I personally was very happy with the print quality. Great little printer!
customer_reviews.author: KingsHorses

customer_reviews.title: I truly love my photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I truly love my photo printer. have already printed a bunch of photos from it . Would recommend it to anyone who like to print their own photos.
customer_reviews.author: katrina wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the printer as a present for a girlfriend. I gave it to her and I left on vacation. When I returned she told me it did not work properly. I tried to do an exchange but I was told after 14 days they will not except it. I believe it is the cartridges that are bad and I asked if I could just exchange those, but was told the same thing. I now need to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sayles

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and I love it. It prints out my pictures in no time and it's barely takes up any room. The pictures are good quality...just as good as paying Walgreen's to do it. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: N. Sirovy

customer_reviews.title: Great Photo's
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He loves it. It prints professonial quality photos. I am very happy with this product. It was defentially a good gift. I would highly recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann Lunardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I received this promptly. Price was VERY reasonable. I needed the printer for a charity function and was able to print beautiful pictures. I will do future business with this person/group.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: we recently purchased the printer for our camera and it has been awesome to be able to carry and print pictures right there while on vacation or right when we get home from a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Trihub

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Really Good Quality Photos! Extremely easy to setup! Reads photos from disk, directly from camera (yeah you don't have to upload them, and then print pictures) or you could use your laptop. This was a really great buy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lalchandani

customer_reviews.title: Canon photo printer
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so happy with a photo printer! So easy to use and the prints are unbelievable! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lea M. O'dell

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Santa
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer. Easy to use and compact. I have had no problems using solo with the memory card or hooked to the pc. Prints great pics in about 60 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: T. Helton

customer_reviews.title: Try to find a pc cable to connect to pc
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great but i have a hard time trying to find a cable to connect to the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes W. Odijk

customer_reviews.title: POOR RESOLUTION AND SPEED
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS GOOD IN THEORY ONLY!! EVEN AT THE HIGHEST PHOTO QUALITY, THE PRINTED IMAGES ARE VERY GRAINY (USING A 6MP CAMERA). ALSO, IT IS VERY SLOW AT PRINTING EVEN THOSE POOR IMAGES. I LIKED THE SIZE OF THE PRINTER AND THE FACT THAT IT SUPPORTS BLUETOOTH, BUT I JUST CANNOT GET PAST THE POOR IMAGE QUALITY!! IT LOOKS LIKE WHAT YOU WOULD HAVE EXPECTED OUT OF A DIGITAL PRINT 5 YEARS AGO!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smoak

customer_reviews.title: Your Order Has Been Shipped -- I Mean Cancelled.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for a Canon SELPHY DS810 Photo Printer through Ritz Camera and received the usual multiple emails thankin me for my order, informing me that my printer "has been shipped," and then "your order has been cancelled" because the item was no longer available. Hmmm... So which is it? Has the item been shipped, or has the order been cancelled. I don't know if this is a function of Amazon.com or of Ritz Camera, but I do know I won't believe it when they say an item is "in stock" or "had been shipped." Lies, all lies.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Kenneth

product_meta.title: Canon SELPHY DS810 Photo Printer
product_meta.description:
Canon Selphy 810 4X6 Print

AMAZON.COM
Digital cameras and mobile phones have changed the rules about taking photos. Now, the SELPHY DS810 Compact Photo Printer changes everything about how and where to print them. It's only about 9" x 9" x 4," much smaller than typical printers. It doesn't have to be connected to your computer, so you can keep it in almost any room and print beautiful photos from there. It features Canon Full-photolithography Inkjet Nozzle Engineering (FINE), which uses an innovative print head with nozzles that eject consistent, precise ink droplets as small as two picoliters. This patented technology produces an outstanding resolution of up to 4,800 x 1,200 dpi, for exceptional detail and photo realism. You won't have to wait long; it can print a beautiful photo lab quality 4" x 6" photograph in about 63 seconds--directly from your PictBridge enabled camera. 

 So, you have family and friends over, and everybody's taking pictures, even with their mobile phones. Why wait until tomorrow--or next week--to see everyone's images? Just put this user-friendly printer in a central place in your den or living room. Its built-in card slots let anyone print from their compatible memory cards, or they can print directly from their PictBridge compatible digital camera or DV camcorder. You and your guests can even print photos from an infrared-enabled mobile phone: just shoot, point your phone and print! Plus, using the large, built-in 2.5" LCD color viewer and control panel you can fine tune your images before printing, for better results. With its small size and easy connectivity, the SELPHY DS810 Compact Photo Printer is the new way to view, print and share your photos. 

 The Canon ChromaLife100 system combines the Selphy DS810 Compact Photo Printer's FINE print head technology and newly developed inks with select Canon photo papers, with results rivaling that of many conventional photos. These beautiful photos will also last up to 100 years when stored in an archival quality photo album. 

 What's in the Box:
SELPHY DS810 Compact Photo Printer, FINE cartridges: BCI-16CL color, power cord, document kit
feature_bullets: Print borderless 4" x 6" photo in as little as 63 seconds
USB and Pictbridge-compatible direct print port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
